<title level="1" right="Rules">[Personal Staves](/Rules.aspx?ID=1499)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 166 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
When the local shops' offerings don't quite match up with the needs of an adventuring spellcaster, they might want to make their own staff to reflect their personal brand of magic. Doing so isn't easy, and only a chosen few know the techniques to create a brand new staff.

 A custom staff is always [unique](/Traits.aspx?ID=161), and you need your GM's permission to create one and introduce it to your game.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
